message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. This is a one-time offer, so don't miss out!
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $150 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $130. This is a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. Let me know what you think!

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $130 is still a bit too high for me. I'm sticking with my offer of $105.  If you're not willing to accept that, I'll have to go with John's offer.
